name: QCT Field: ChipGroup
description: Chip group field to choose one or any elements with chips

attributes.name: displayName
attributes.description: Key name of the record to show name of element

attributes.name: valueName
attributes.description: Key name of the record to get value

attributes.name: iconName
attributes.description: Key name of the record to get path to icon. Should be image link

attributes.name: query
attributes.description: Select url path to fetch application

attributes.name: setGlobal
attributes.description: Set value into global values of page
